\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 53694}

\subsection*{Sweet Sleep}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{Eazy E}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 &   & oral &  & daily\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 0.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
I have used Remeron a lot to help me sleep. It helps some with depression although I found that meditating and praying to God helped my depression more.



Anyways, here is what I have experienced on remeron.



First of all crazy dreams, very intense and vivid.



Some cravings for sweets when on it, it makes me hungry sometimes.



When I started taking it the remeron makes me sleep for like 24 hours straight.
